scripts.build: npm run js && npm run static && npm run css
scripts.static: mkdir -p dist && cp src/index.html dist/ && cp -R src/static/* dist/
scripts.css: mkdir -p dist/css && sass -I src/css -I jspm_packages/github/twbs/bootstrap-sass@3.3.5/assets/stylesheets src/css/app.scss > dist/css/bundle.css
scripts.start: npm run server & npm run watch
scripts.test: rm -f spec/compiled.js && jspm bundle-sfx spec.js src/js/spec/compiled.js --skip-source-maps && karma start
scripts.watch: npm run clean && npm run build && onchange src -- npm run build
